00104     public function addClient( $arRequestData = array() )
00105     {
00106         if ( $arRequestData['country'] != 'US' && empty( $arRequestData['state'] ) )
00107             $arRequestData['state'] = 'NONE';
00108 
00109         return $this->makeApiCall( self::CLIENT_API, 'addclient', $arRequestData );
00110     }
00111

00120     }
